channel.title: ✩★✩ScarFaceX 639 Best PvP Server✩★✩
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://s16.postimg.org/e77oq3hed/image.png[/img] ScarFaceX 637 is pk based server. You can login straight away and pk with almost any gear. The use of Tokkuls as currency make this server unique. Using these Tokkuls, you can purchase a variety of items that are in high demand and also have random PVP drops!.
Players of ScarFaceX 637 have complete control of ALL their skills the commands "::master" and ""::setlevel x y" make it easy for everyone to pk instantly! If you are not convinced yet, take a look at some of our features:
[IMG]http://s16.postimg.org/4y0x28j4l/C_Users_Mohsin_Downloads_LINKS.png[/img] [SIZE=3][COLOR="#0000FF"][URL=http://"http://scarfacex.com/"]Home Page![/URL][/COLOR][/SIZE] Vote! ! [URL=http://"http://scarfacex.com/play/"][SIZE=3][COLOR="#0000FF"]Play Now! [/COLOR][/SIZE][/URL] [COLOR="#0000FF"][SIZE=3][URL=http://"http://scarfacex.com/forum/"]Forums![/URL][/SIZE][/COLOR] [IMG]http://s16.postimg.org/wk3omx2hh/C_Users_Mohsin_Downloads_FEATURES.png[/img] -Dicing ! -HD -Duel -Auto Donate -Auto Vote -PVP -Dragon Claws! -Armadyl Godsword! -PvP Armour and Weapons! -Partyhats & H'ween Masks! -Currency as Tokkuls -::Meleegear & ::Magegear & ::Rangegear -Overloads, Extremes, Recover Specials! -PvP Armour & Weapons! -Great PKing Spots! (Edgeville, Easts, Wests, E.g, etc...) -Curses and Normal Prayers! -24/7 up-time! -Perfect Hybridding! -Perfect Switching! -Great Community! -Fully Working PK Highscores! -INSTANT Donation System! - Working Dungeoneering Cape! - Vote4Tokkuls! - Overloads! - Quick Prayers! - All working curses! - All working Lunars, Ancient, and Modern spells! - Fully working Korasi - Nex armours - Working Divine Shield effect and Elysian shield effect - Great Economy! - Vote For Points - Working Kill Count - Working Death Count - Working KDR Count - Working Magic - Realistic economy. - Active/ Friendly Staff! - Items On Death - Working Curses - Working Hand Cannon - Working EXP Counter - ALOT OF STUFF IS WORKING! YOU GET THE POINT!
